name: Flappy Bird RTX
description:
That game from a video from my YT channel.

Input:

Space Bar - Jump & Restart Game

L - Delete current highscore

Shift+1 - Low settings

Shift+2 - Medium Settings

Shift+3 - High Settings

Shift+4 - Ultra Settings

Shift+5 - Ultra Settings + RTX ON. Requires to run with directX 12 (-dx12  command), and at least gtx1060 + appropriate nvidia drivers.
